title: IDragArrowManipulator.AllowFlip
description: Gets or sets whether the unidirectional handle can change direction when dragged past length = 0.
returns: True to allow the unidirectional handle to change direction when dragged past length = 0, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IDragArrowManipulator::ShowOppositeDirection
is false.
